about_the_game:
A young mage from a noble family arrives at a distant castle to find it ruined and her sister missing. Will she recover lost monster girls and restore peace with their power? What price will she have to pay?

Ada, the female protagonist, is a prodigal mage with the ability to use monster girls' power as her own. Combine them to create your own playstyle from a powerful battle-mage to a delicate temptress. Will you overcome your enemies through force or make them into your toys? It's up to you!



Features

More than 100 hentai scenes in the gallery with over 1600 CG frames in 1280x720 resolution.

34 monster girls from a fluffy kitsune to a delicate fairy for you to meet and have fun with! A fair warning - their idea of "fun" may or may not be equal with yours ;)

A long list of fetishes – from yuri and tentacles to femdom and gangbangs with bondage.

23 dresses, each one with unique visual art (which is visible on the heroine) and skills to build your own fighting style.

3 endings based on your choices during the journey along with mini-events from optional plotlines.

185 game zones to explore. And a lot of other interesting stuff like puzzles and minigames!



Controls and special functions

Yorna is optimized for and fully supports keyboard and mouse input. Depending on the configuration, XInput game controller or similar emulators can be used without any guarantee of success.

Some special controls may be accessible only with keyboard input. You can see the full list of special controls in the Controls & features pdf file or inside the game itself.



Adult content disclaimer

This game has adult materials and just to be sure - all characters involved in any sexual act in Yorna: Monster Girl’s Secret are over 18 years old. Yorna is a hentai RPG game with explicit sexual content intended for adult auditory only. The game has graphical descriptions of sex, genitals, crotch region and cum. Also. the game has an optional scene with a priestess who wears a semi-classic nun outfit.

Sex pairings: Male x Female, Female x Female, Multiple Males x Female.

After losing a battle, the protagonist will usually have unprotected sex with the victor.

Along with traditional sex, the game features several scenes with group activity, light domination, tentacles and rope suspension.

Yorna has an optional activity for the protagonist to work as a maid and serve clients in a sexual way.

Aside from classic monster girls, sex scenes include interracial sex encounters with fictional races like minotaurs, gnolls, satyrs, ogres and fucktopuses (YESH!).

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains graphical sex scenes with multiple partners and fantasy creatures. The game also covers scenes and topics on prostitution. Losing in combat often results in H scene with the victor.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo U7600
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2.0 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720 or better video resolution
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo U7600
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A young mage from a noble family arrives at a distant castle to find it ruined and her sister missing. Will she able to restore peace with their power? Combine various skills to create your own playstyle. Will you overcome your enemies through force or make them into your toys? It's up to you!
